comments.body: Maybe bail here if master isn't tracking the upstream master branch (my setup is to track origin master)?  I have no idea if my setup is common, so also you can ignore and wait for anyone to actually hit that problem...

1) I will apply some checks here, good idea;
2) This is currently just a debug feature, to keep me from thrashing my comcast quota while testing. This flag is not exposed in the tool's public API. By default, we always clone a fresh repo before operating on it, to ensure that the remotes are configured correctly.

You could use `late final` to set this up automagically, assuming some light wrapper

```dart
late final Directory checkoutDirectory = lazilyInitialize(parentDirectory.childDirectory(name));
```

You might need to tweak `lazilyInitialize` to return the original directory
